Header: A/L students warned not to misbehave after exams
Content: The Department of Examinations states that students are prohibited from behaving in a disruptive manner following the conclusion of the Advanced Level examination on Monday (04). Issuing a communiqu√©, the Commissioner General of Examinations, noted that all police stations have been informed to arrest such students. Further, if any student is found responsible for such an act, examination results of those will be nullified, he warned.
